title: Bug 134040: Row has unexpected page break property in Property Editor
description: The bug involves the incorrect handling of page break properties for rows in the Property Editor.
OB: Page break can be set to a row in the Property Editor, but the changes cannot be saved.
EB: Row should not have a page break property in the Property Editor. The ability to set a page break for a row should be disabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a grid or table.
2. Select a row in the grid or table.
3. Attempt to set the pageBreak property for the selected row.
